title: Overhead electric supply lines including space for electrical transformer sub-station according to the requirements of the electric distribution licensees, water supply and drainage line
clause_text: Overhead electric supply lines including space for electrical transformer sub-station according to the requirements of the electric distribution licensees, water supply and drainage line. Such other particulars as may be prescribed by the Commissioner.
